_xResult.title: Burgundy Velvet Tuxedo
_xResult.shortdesc: Fully customizable soft velvet tuxedo with black satin lapels
_xResult.longdesc:
Style is power, and this burgundy tuxedo is far more than a chic alternative to an evening gown – it’s a statement in its own right. Cut and tailored from velvet fabric specifically with women in mind, this beautiful slim fitting burgundy tuxedo suit accentuates your feminine figure. The fully lined, flat-front pants with straight side pockets and front zipper creates a classic tuxedo suit for all occasions. 

 

Sumissura creates suits that can be customized in almost every way. If you'd rather have different lapels or a wide leg, just reach out to Sumissura to see how they can create your perfect suit.
